select c.id, c.is_deleted, c.customer_name, c.customer_age, c.customer_sex, c.idcard, c.room_no, c.building_no, c.checkin_date, c.expiration_date, c.contact_tel, c.bed_id, c.psychosomatic_state, c.attention, c.birthday, c.height, c.weight, c.blood_type, c.filepath, c.user_id, c.level_id, c.family_member, b.bed_no, n.level_name, u.nickname from customer c left join user u on c.user_id = u.id left join bed b on c.bed_id = b.id left join nurselevel n on c.level_id = n.id
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.custormer_id = c.id and cni.is_deleted = 0) = 0
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.custormer_id = c.id and cni.is_deleted=0) > 0
and user_id = -1
and c.customer_name like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and c.user_id = #{userId}
and c.is_deleted = 0
order by c.id desc limit #{currentPage}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) as count from customer c left join user u on c.user_id = u.id left join bed b on c.bed_id = b.id left join nurselevel n on c.level_id = n.id
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.custormer_id = c.id and cni.is_deleted = 0) = 0
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.custormer_id = c.id and cni.is_deleted=0) > 0
and user_id = -1
and c.customer_name like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
and c.user_id = #{userId}
and c.is_deleted = 0
order by c.id desc
